dt: {bc}any of a genus ({it}Spiraea{/it}) of deciduous shrubs of the rose family with small usually white or pink flowers in dense racemes, corymbs, cymes, or panicles
{bc}any of several garden plants resembling spireas
{bc}a shrub ({it}Astilbe japonica{/it}) of the saxifrage family

et: New Latin {it}Spiraea{/it}, from Latin, a plant, from Greek {it}speiraia{/it}
shortdef: any of a genus (Spiraea) of deciduous shrubs of the rose family with small usually white or pink flowers in dense racemes, corymbs, cymes, or panicles
any of several garden plants resembling spireas; especially : a shrub (Astilbe japonica) of the saxifrage family
